mapper.insert: insert into econsole.user (kd_user, auth_key, email, password_hash, username, status, pemda_id, created_at, updated_at ) values ( #{params.kd_user}, #{params.auth_key}, #{params.email}, #{params.password_hash}, #{params.username}, #{params.status}, #{params.pemda_id}, #{params.created_at}, #{params.updated_at})
insert into auth_assignment (item_name, user_id, created_at) values (#{params.role},#{params.id},#{params.created_at})
mapper.update: update auth_assignment set item_name = #{params.role} where user_id = #{params.id}
update user_pemda set pemda_id = #{params.pemda_id} where user_id = #{params.id}
